data.Title: Perplexity Launches Revenue Sharing Program Amid Plagiarism Concerns
data.Description: Perplexity is launching a program to share ad revenue with publishing partners following weeks of plagiarism accusations. When Perplexity features content from these publishers in response to user queries, the publishers will receive a share of the ad revenue.

data.Title: Google Advises Against Switching M-Dot URLs to Canonical
data.Description: Google's John Mueller reiterated advice that you should not switch your m-dot URLs to be the canonical URL, even though Google is fully switched over to mobile-first indexing. He said this is just because it is how it is done, how it was done, and switching it on Google's end would cause many large sites issues.

data.Title: Google Search Console Performance Report Filter Bug to Be Fixed
data.Description: Google Search Console has a bug with the Search Performance report, where if you want to filter by Search Appearance, it won't show you all the options. Google is aware of the bug and it should be fixed soon.

data.Title: Google's Antitrust Defense May Benefit from SearchGPT Threat
data.Description: The new peril Google faces from generative AI could play a role in the outcome of a landmark trial where a judge must decide whether the tech giant illegally monopolized online search.

data.Title: SearchGPT to Drive Innovation in Search and SEO
data.Description: Google has long dominated search, and with OpenAI's SearchGPT, the pressure is on for Google to make its search product better.

data.Title: Ahrefs Launches Content Changes Feature for Competitor Analysis
data.Description: Want to know what content changes improved your competitors' rankings? You can now easily find out with Ahrefs' new Content Changes feature.

data.Title: Apple Maps Appears in Google SERPs
data.Description: Discussion of Apple Maps showing up in Google SERPs.

data.Title: AI-Generated Content and Its Impact on Search Rankings
data.Description: Ah, when a site pumps out 1M+ urls using AI and surges like crazy in Google. Note, it just started to drop a bit, but still ranks for over 600K queries right now. I'm sure Google will catch up (like it has for many sites doing this), but for now they are doing very, very well.

data.Title: Google Discover to Feature AI Overviews
data.Description: Google Discover promoting AI Overviews with buttons to jump to Search to see the AI Overviews

data.Title: Microsoft Enhances Bing with Generative AI
data.Description: Microsoft has unveiled a generative AI-powered search experience for Bing, aiming to deliver more dynamic and detailed responses to user queries.

data.Title: Google's Next Core Update Imminent
data.Description: Google's John Mueller says the next core update is not extremely far away, in response to those waiting for their image thumbnails to show up in Google Search - but John can't give a timeline

data.Title: Google Search Ranking Volatility Remains High
data.Description: Google Search ranking volatility continues to be superheated over the past two weeks - is this Google testing the next core update?

data.Title: Google Business Profiles Introduces AI-Powered Menu Generation
data.Description: Google Business Profiles has a new AI feature to "Generate a menu from your uploaded photo"

data.Title: Google Search May Be Showing Fewer X/Twitter Carousels
data.Description: Is Google Search showing X/Twitter carousels less often for news queries and topics?

data.Title: Google Ads Integrates with Google Merchant Center Feeds and AI Image Editor
data.Description: Google Ads integration with Google Merchant Center feeds to AI image editor

data.Title: New Google Ad Format Under Consideration
data.Description: For your consideration new Google Ad format
